articles.title: Anthropic partners with CodePath to bring Claude to the US’s largest collegiate computer science program
Chris Liddell appointed to Anthropic’s board of directors
Anthropic raises $30 billion in Series G funding at $380 billion post-money valuation
articles.summary: We have raised $30 billion in Series G funding led by GIC and Coatue, valuing Anthropic at $380 billion post-money. The investment will fuel the frontier research, product development, and infrastructure expansions that have made Anthropic the market leader in enterprise AI and coding. Our run-rate

articles.title: Anthropic is donating $20 million to Public First Action
Covering electricity price increases from our data centers
Introducing Claude Opus 4.6
articles.summary: We’re upgrading our smartest model. Across agentic coding, computer use, tool use, search, and finance, Opus 4.6 is an industry-leading model, often by wide margin.

articles.title: Claude is a space to think
articles.summary: We’ve made a choice: Claude will remain ad-free. We explain why advertising incentives are incompatible with a genuinely helpful AI assistant, and how we plan to expand access without compromising user trust.

ServiceNow chooses Claude to power customer apps and increase internal productivity
Introducing Claude Sonnet 4.5
articles.summary: Claude Sonnet 4.5 sets new benchmark records in coding, reasoning, and computer use while being Anthropic's most aligned model, accompanied by the release of the Claude Agent SDK for building capable agents
